Pre-Game Insights: The Angels tried to convince Shohei Ohtani to stay with them during his free agency, but their $700 million offer was not made.
Others: Ohtani's return to Angel Stadium will be his first regular-season appearance at the stadium as a member of a visiting club.
Ohtani is chasing MLB history with his 44 home runs and 46 stolen bases, leaving the league's first 50-50 season within reach.
